tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: At first i wanted to quit this course but i pulled through and it wasn\'t so bad. i definitely discovered my drawing potential. BEWARE- HARD GRADER. i was sure i was getting a definite A+, but at the end, i got an A-, im not one to complain about an A- but this one was unjustified; i feel like he wouldnt give an a+ unless youre picasso

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: He might not be the world\'s greatest teacher , but I definitely became a better artist by the end of this class. At first I was really confused , I wanted to give up majoring in fine arts completely , but one class he took a step back and really clarified things , which helped a lot and I improved greatly. I would recommend him as a teacher.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Horrible, pretentious and impossible to please. Does nothing to help with your artwork and only badmouths you instead of giving constructive criticism. I would say he plays favorites but he doesn\'t seem to like anyone in his classes. It was because of him that I personally lost interest in art and stopped being an art major.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Participation matters (1)
comments: Nuno needs to lighten up, and get laid! He\'s sooo pretentous and is unable to encourage and support the work of his students.
